item.title: Contact
item.description: I am a freelance frontend developer, currently specializing in Shopify. I am interested in CSS, GSAP, SVG, Image Optimization, Accessibility, and much more. For personal projects I use static site generators like 11ty and Hugo; I work as a Portuguese to English translator, and enjoy writing. Contact me with any queries about Shopify or anything else. I'm avaialable for jobs big and small or if you just want some free advice.
